name: Automaton Heart
description:
With the world on the brink, play as the Automaton Efi Lillium as she found herself in a city devastated and swarmed by the rogue machines created by the humans. Efi as special as she was, created by her master, and someone who possesses sentience to the level of a human’s, is being hunted by the machines to be studied.  As Efi, you must escape the city while fighting enemies that may get in the way.

(Note: Currently in development for school Capstone Project.)
